__e: The rest of you dry misers come in here to take up the room?
I'm really in a hurry, so why don't I drop you off at the nearest phone?
If they stay in step for another 10 meters... everything will go all right.
Just tell your men to keep their ... mouth shut and their eyes open.
And to have more time to be with your children and wives
And I'm going to give you a chance to be together to the very end.
Hey, that was a mighty fine talk you gave the boys back there about sticking together.
Is it true that she gave you a deadline of Christmas 1979 to be together?
That's nice. It makes business so much smoother.
And then you let him and his son stay there for four more years.
It won't hurt you to go one night without water.
All I'm saying is that you're not ready to fight yet and, if you stay here, you'll get trapped and stand no chance.
I want you to tell everyone to stay put. Right.
If you stay here, you won't live to see tomorrow!
Tell the people to stay at home.
And tell them to keep home tonight.
Professor, I think you'd both better stay in your quarters.
